rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0001
rows.name:
It's not as developed as in Invidia,
but Superbia has its share of
mercenary-type work as well.

rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0002
rows.name:
'Course, unlike in Invidia, you're not
likely to see the army handing out
missions to mercs around here.

rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0003
rows.name:
And we don't have actual organized
mercenary bands. Most you'll generally
find is teams of a few people.

rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0004
rows.name:
As a rule, mercenary work around here
is more of an ad-hoc, solo affair.

rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0005
rows.name:
That said, there's plenty of requests
from the general populace. The sorts of
little things the army wouldn't handle.

rows.label: tlk45310158_02_msg0006
rows.name:
So guys like me can make a
decent living! Hahahah!
